name: Roca Finance
description: Roca Finance is a decentralized finance (DeFi) ecosystem built to deliver secure, transparent, and community-driven financial solutions. Designed with a DEX-first strategy, Roca combines automated yield strategies, liquidity mining, and governance under one unified platform. Users can trade, provide liquidity, and stake with clear, on-chain reward schedules while retaining self-custody. Audited smart contracts power all core actions. The ROCA token is used for fees, staking rewards, and governanceâ€”aligning incentives across the protocol.
